column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Easily one of my top 5 dining experiences
column2: from the onset the service was amazing. Free coat check
column3: and the bartender was very friendly while we waited for our table. Reservations recommended ( we waited a bit longer for a booth which was totally ok). Not once did my water glass get empty
column4: the type of attentiveness without being intrusive is priceless . Our waitress
column5: also a Sacramento State alumni was not only fun
column6: but very helpful and made sure my partners birthday dinner was memorable. Will definitely be coming back
